p: The Avahan India AIDS Initiative of the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation was a large scale focused HIV and STI Prevention Program in South India for KPs. Avahan used programmatic mapping for strategic planning and specifically to determine where, when, and for whom interventions should be prioritized. Avahan is also a very nice example of using Program Science to determine what intervention mix is required and how to deliver these interventions in their programs [ 23, 39, 40].
